name: Meetings
text: §448H-4  Meetings.  The board shall meet not less than twice a year at a time and place as determined by the board.  The board shall also meet but not later than thirty days prior to the licensing examination pursuant to section 448H-5(2) in order to evaluate applications therefor.  Any board member who misses two consecutive meetings of the board or fifty per cent of the meetings in a year shall be removed from the board. [L 1971, c 190, pt of §1; am L 1979, c 217, §3; am L 1982, c 204, §8; am L 1983, c 36, §3; am L 1992, c 202, §87; am L 1993, c 6, §22]
